snippet: The Taxi and Limousine Commission has issued a request for information concerning “anti-speeding vehicle technologies,” including anti-speeding devices for cars.
abstract: New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission issues request for information concerning 'anti-speeding vehicle technologies'; devices include speed governors that can intervene when drivers exceed the posted limit and systems that sound alarms if fatigue or reckless driving is detected.
lead_paragraph: The Taxi and Limousine Commission has issued a request for information concerning “anti-speeding vehicle technologies,” including anti-speeding devices for cars.

headline.main: City Explores Ways to Curb Taxi Speeds
headline.print_headline: City Explores Ways to Curb Taxi Speeds
